title: Boolean Algebra in Digital Systems and Computing
description: Evaluate your understanding of how Boolean algebra is applied in real-world digital systems, hardware, software, and programming logic.

questions.question: What is the main role of Boolean algebra in digital systems?
options: Managing binary logic and signal processing

questions.question: Which hardware component uses Boolean logic to perform arithmetic and decision-making?
Which of the following is a key application of Boolean logic in software programming?
What does a logic simulator like Logisim allow users to do?
options: Design and test digital circuits using Boolean gates

questions.question: In programming, what does the expression `(a && b)` represent?
Which type of chip allows users to configure logic using Boolean expressions?
Which hardware description language is commonly used to express Boolean logic for circuit design?
What kind of logic operation would a firewall most likely use?
options: Boolean condition checking (e.g., source AND port)
